idea-plugin.name: Clean Code Method Rearranger
idea-plugin.description:
Rearranges the methods in Java classes according to the Robert C. Martin's Step-down Rule.
Features :
  • Rearranges methods of Java classes
  • Supports inner classes
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Release 0.1: Initial release.
Release 0.2: Fixes problem with a certain count of methods.

action.description: Rearrange Methods according to Stepdown Rule
